title: Investor earns fair financial returns without requiring extraction
description: Investor earns fair financial returns without requiring extraction
content:
Scenario: Investor earns fair financial returns without requiring extraction
    Given stock market averages ~7% annual returns through maximizing extraction
    And Patricia accepted lower returns (5%) for values alignment
    When democratic business proves financially sustainable
    Then 5% returns are paid reliably from business revenue
    And returns come from democratic value circulation, not worker exploitation
    And financial viability proves extraction isn't necessary for investor returns
    And she earns modestly while workers earn living wages and community benefits
    And community_elohim ensures transparent return calculations and timely payments
